sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl2_f1, ss_tbl2_f2, ss_tbl2_f3, ss_tbl2_f4, ss_tbl2_f5, ss_tbl2_f6, ss_tbl2_f7, ss_tbl2_f8, ss_tbl2_f9, ss_tbl2_f10, ss_tbl2_f11, ss_tbl2_f12, ss_tbl2_f13, ss_tbl2_f14, ss_tbl2_f15, ss_tbl2_f16, ss_tbl2_f17, ss_tbl2_f18, ss_tbl2_f19, ss_tbl2_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl2 WHERE ss_tbl2_id = @ss_tbl2_id;
